Title: Establishes the SAT school day program and the SAT school day fund
Summary: Establishes the SAT school day program and the SAT school day fund; directs the department of education to establish and maintain the SAT school day program to enter into contract with the college board to provide the annual administration of the SATs at all public secondary schools free of charge during one regular school day.
LawCode: Add ยง342-b, Ed L; add ยง89-k, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the SAT school day program; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the SAT school day fund
